title: Ice Breaking and Orchard Thoughts
content: Keep records. Learn the new patterns — if there are any. Because the challenge we will be facing for decades to come is a seeming lack of pattern, and we humans don’t do well in random time.
creator: Eliza Daley
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: The Youth Movement in a Post-Growth World
content: We need all hands on deck to ideate new ways to equip the Youth Movement with a holistic, radical approach. To generate systemic change, young activists must be brave in their criticism of capitalism and growth. Unfortunately, they must also get comfortable with doubt, not knowing exactly what tomorrow will look like.
creator: Adel Ramdani
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Wide Boundary News: Biodiversity Depletion, Iran & the Strait of Hormuz, and the Green Wedge
content: This week’s Frankly is another edition of Nate’s Wide Boundary News series, where he invites listeners to view the constant churn of headlines through a wider-boundary lens. Today’s edition features reflections on renewable energy and CO2 emission trends, updates on species adaptability, and a discussion about nuclear treaties and Iran.
creator: Nate Hagens
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Humanity as Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde: The Symptoms, Patterns, and Drivers
content: In this week’s Frankly, Nate looks at how aggregate human behavior changes as groups scale from small tribes to large and complex societies. He uses the framing of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde throughout the episode to illustrate how traits that once helped small groups survive can serve to destabilize complex societies when expanded globally.
creator: Nate Hagens
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Regenerative agriculture: what works, works
content: Some thirty years ago, one of the organic pioneers, Carl Haest, said about sustainable agriculture, “friend in the field, foe in the market”. That seems to hold also for regenerative agriculture.
creator: Gunnar Rundgren
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Wars and rumors of wars: Iran edition
content: An attack on Iran appears imminent. Here's why I think it's unlikely that we'll see President Trump "TACO" this time.
creator: Kurt Cobb
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Lessons from the “Poor Man’s Cow”
content: Shane has been busy with the next generation on and off the farm too, visiting schools with a herd of Old Irish Goats. Once a common sight in the Irish countryside, this rare native breed is helping to revive a cultural heritage that has lessons to teach us today, on biodiversity, wildfire management, and the transmission of knowledge from one generation to the next.
creator: Shane Casey
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Building a Climate-Resilient MENA: Integrating Natural Cycles for Strategic Stability
content: A climate doctrine must integrate resource mobilization, agricultural modernization, energy diversification, and territorial planning within a coherent framework—one that anticipates rather than reacts, protects rather than repairs, and organizes rather than fragments.
creator: El Habib Ben Amara
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Widening the We: Meeting the Crisis of Common Sense
content: Building an inclusionary common sense will take an understanding of the relationship between our social history, our experience of inclusionary social policies, and the opposing psychosocial dynamic that promotes a readiness to scuttle the gains those policies produced through a belonging based on fear and threat.
creator: Colin Greer
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: A Holistic Blueprint for Restoration
content: As a core component of our sustainability and scale-up policy, RUWAI is establishing Climate Resilience hubs across Africa. This innovative, inclusive, and sustainability-driven initiative serves as a centralized spot to equip rural women, youth, children, and people living with disabilities with the essential tools, education, skills and resources required to transcend poverty and forge a resilient, brighter future.
creator: Uche Isieke
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Black History Month: Land, Power, and the Knowledge That Survived
content: What forms of ecological knowledge have we ignored because they emerged from survival rather than privilege—and what would it require to center them now?
creator: Nikki Woods
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Big Tech Accused of AI ‘Greenwashing’
content: The big tech industry’s claims about the climate benefits of artificial intelligence (AI) are largely unproven and unsubstantiated, according to a new report from a coalition of climate advocacy and accountability groups.
creator: Joey Grostern
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: We All Need To Go To Business School
content: Ten years ago, I started teaching at Bard’s Green MBA Program, where I now teach classes in economics, economic development, community investment funds, and “sustaining mission.” And what I can report is that the several hundred students I taught have created, run, or improved an amazing assortment of mission-oriented enterprises.
creator: Michael Shuman
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: National Security
content: One thing is clear—when politicians invoke the phrase “national security,” they are never talking about security for the people who live in this country.
creator: Mary Wildfire
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.
